pageProduct.name: Sukin Signature Foaming Facial Cleanser 50ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Our Signature Facial Foaming Cleanser provides you with a non-drying, gentle cleanser for normal to oily skin types. Make up, daily dirt build up and excess oils are removed to reveal a balanced, cleansed complexion. A combination of Chamomile, Aloe Vera, Green Tea and Witch Hazel soothes the skin, while light hydration is promoted through oils of Evening Primrose and Rosehip.

Warnings

e.g. Avoid contact with the eyes and rinse immediately if contact occurs. If irritation occurs rinse immediately and discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, PEG-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile), Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract (Green Tea), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Glycerin, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (Rose Hip), Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Vanillin, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Linalool*. * Natural component of essential oils

Directions

Apply a small amount to moist hands and lather with water. Gently massage into skin. Rinse thoroughly with water. Use once or twice daily
